snippet: Victoria Azarenka’s unapologetic lack of polish has left her as one of the notable presences in women’s tennis, but not one of the most popular with crowds.
abstract: VIctoria Azarenka, known for her distinctive grunting and unapologetic lack of polish, is preparing to face Maria Sharapova in the women's semifinals at the United States Open.
lead_paragraph: Victoria Azarenka’s unapologetic lack of polish has left her as one of the notable presences in women’s tennis, but not one of the most popular with crowds.

headline.seo: Victoria Azarenka Has Sound and Style All Her Own
headline.main: No. 1 With a Sound and Style All Her Own
headline.print_headline: No. 1 With a Sound and Style All Her Own
